channel.title: Projects on Saumya Gaurang Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Saumya Gaurang Shah

item.title: Analysing Correlations between Drawing and Writing on a Consumer Tablet
item.description: This is an ongoing project with the aim to analyse correlation between drawing and writing data for kids performing these tasks on a consumer tablet. The comparison between drawing and writing shall be made between kids of different grades using about a 100 features based on tilt, pressure and veloocity of the strokes. Since the kids inhigher grades can be expected to be more proficient in writing, our analysis can give insights into the transfer of skills between the tasks of drawing and writing.

item.title: Diagnosing Dysgraphia Using Handwriting Data Analysis
Julia Seasons of Contributions
item.description: The final blog post summarising the work done and describing the plans for the future can be viewed here.

item.title: Kritsnam Technologies
item.description: During this internship, I worked with Atlas Scientific pH, EC, DO and Temperature sensors. After exploring their working and physical principles, I integrated these sensors with Particle Electron Embedded Platform. This was done via mobile data(2G) to retrieve the data for the aforementioned sensors using Atlas Scientific EZO Circuits. Then, using this data, I proposed a regression technique based on reverse engineering the EZO circuits by establishing a relationship between the analog signals received from the sensors and their corresponding physical quantity.

item.title: SLAM: Extraction of Backend Data and Comparison of Backend Solvers
